snippet: A 32-part adaptation of the novels, which trace the friendship of two women, will be filmed in Italy with the involvement of the pseudonymous author.
abstract: Italian production companies Wildside and Fandango will co-produce television series based on Elena Ferrante's wildly popular Neapolitan novels.
lead_paragraph: A 32-part adaptation of the novels, which trace the friendship of two women, will be filmed in Italy with the involvement of the pseudonymous author.

headline.main: Elena Ferrante Novels Destined for Television Series
